abilities.name: Evolutionary Thunder
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Jolteon ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Second Bite
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunder Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a Lightning Energy card attached to Jolteon ex.
